SSID: Epoc-XXXXXX
Password: 88888888 This device is configurable via an iPad / iPhone app. "W001_MIANPCB_V3" is silkscreened on the breakout module in the FCC internal photos. "EBA6831A9C10000" is silkscreened on the router module in the FCC internal photos. "CPR916AG" is visible on a label on the router module in the FCC internal photos. [http://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/epoc-mini/id542276072?mt=8 Epoc Mini iPad app] 74:72:F2:07:23:FF may be the MAC address of the FCC EUT ([http://www.chipsip.com/ CHIPSIP OUI]) ==Links of Interest== [http://www.eeyelog.com/en/product_view.asp?cid=108&eid=126 Product page]
